name: Piteraq
description:
Piteraq is a school project made by A.C.T. III aka 5 Game Design students.

It's a first person horror game where you play as a small creature who just escaped from a Canadian laboratory. Will you manage to make it out alive despite the many soldiers guarding the forest?

Controls: 
- mouse (move the camera)
- ZQSD (movements)
- space bar (jump)
- shift (run)
